Hi everyone,

Our team is switching from limelight to photonvision, and I tried to implement the example code on the photonvision docs, but it keeps crashing. Am I missing something?

Thanks in advance!

Here is the code (I can’t seem to get GitHub to work for some reason):
Robot.java (7.5 KB)

Another_Person1:

but it keeps crashing

What do you mean by it keeps crashing? What does the error message say?

So it seems like at some point in your code you’re passing this.config to a Swerve controller. When you’re doing that, you need to make sure this.config exists, otherwise it’ll throw this exception.

It looks to me like this line in the Robot class is the issue:

  SwerveDrive Swerve = new Swerve Drive(null, null, kDefaultPeriod, null);

You’re creating the swerve drive with most of the parameters set to null so when it attempts to use them it throws a NullPointerExeption and crashes the code.
